body.name: Central Park Beige White Stripe Farmhouse Curtains Semi-Sheer Rayon Blend Heavy Linen Texture Window Curtain Panel 6 Grommets Treatment for Living Room/Bedroom, Set of 2, 44" x 84" Each

Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 12 hrs 50 mins
features: Vertical Stripe Pattern: Vertical stripe pattern can prolong the room height in terms of visual effects, reducing the pressure of tight spaces. Suitable for basement, bedroom farmhouse and living room.
Functional & Fashionable: This heavy textured window curtain panel is composed of Linen Rayon Blend, very natural and eco friendly. This can provide privacy and no see through these curtains.

Decorative & Elegant: Touches of elegance take your décor to a whole new level. Perfect for bedroom, living room, farmhouse, home office, adult or child's room, versatile style for any room in your home.
Packaging: Each package includes two curtain panels of 44" wide x 84" length. The unique design of 6 metal grommet creates fashion for your house, which makes the curtains easy to install and slide.
Easy Care: Machine washable in cold water, gentle cycle, tumble dry low. Cool iron if needed.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Are you tired of simple and ordinary curtains? Do you want to change the style in your place without spending a fortune? If yes, then no hesitation here! These beautiful and textured Central Park Stripe Curtain panels are a great choice for anyone seeking an elegant, impressive and fashionable look for their rooms. It is not cheap looks but very rich effect. Central Park rayon blend heavy linen texture fabric are 250gsm and can be hung in living room, dining room, farmhouse and bedroom.

Product information Color: Beige; Gray; Blue; Black Material: Rayon blend heavy linen texture 250gsm fabric Specification: With 6 grommets Size: 44"x63"x2; 44"x84"x2; 44"x95"x2; 44"x108"x2 Product information Color: Beige; Gray; Blue; Black Material: Rayon blend heavy linen texture 250gsm fabric Specification: With 6 grommets Size: 44"x63"x2; 44"x84"x2; 44"x95"x2; 44"x108"x2 Product information Color: Beige; Gray; Blue; Black Material: Rayon blend heavy linen texture 250gsm fabric Specification: With 6 grommets Size: 44"x63"x2; 44"x84"x2; 44"x95"x2; 44"x108"x2 Product information Color: Beige; Gray; Blue; Black Material: Rayon blend heavy linen texture 250gsm fabric Specification: With 6 grommets Size: 44"x63"x2; 44"x84"x2; 44"x95"x2; 44"x108"x2 Beige Gray Blue Black

Heavy Textured Fabric This is a heavy textured fabric with print, fashionable and functional. Stripe design can enrich the décor and bring sophistication to any home. Grommet Design The grommets holes are large enough for most rods in the market making it easy to move the curtain along the rods. Interior diameter is about 1.5 inches. Soft and Durable Our window curtains has a very soft hand feel and drapery, high quality material, durable 10+ years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Arrived exactly as depicted on the store page. No odors, flaws or damage of any kind. You could hang these right away--there were no creases or wrinkles out of the box. The length (95 in) was perfect for the room. The fabric is substantial but lets a pleasant amt. of sunlight filter thru. The grey stripe is on the lighter side but is very attractive. Was a very good purchase for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are perfect! I love how much they brighten my room and give that nautical feel!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these Curtains
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful addition to my new apartment. They are not sheer, but let some light in. Works great over blinds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Price Quality Curtain Panel Pair
reviews.reviewText: I decided to get this particular set of curtains for a bathroom project. The price was the best I could find. Amazon shipping is another reason I chose this set. They are fabulous curtains! I was stunned at the heft and weight. The reason I am giving 4/5 stars is only because I thought they would be a bit more sheer and the white stripe in the panel is a bit too white for what I am needing. However, I am keeping them and using them in another room! I ordered another set in green!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful curtains, even nicer than I was expecting. Very nice fabric, well made, color as pictured. They are not sheer, also not blackout, they are light filtering which is exactly what I wanted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So elegant for a rough linen-like material
reviews.reviewText: About a year ago, I purchased a rough Belgium linen set of black/gray/white long and wide curtains for an inside patio door. They look super but needed a bit more "stuffing" in the middle of the 20' patio door. Although these are a different stripe, they are the same color stripes. I love matching stripes and will put these up inside the 2 that are already up and they will look smashing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely gorgeous curtains!! I'm beyond happy with the quality. Would definitely buy them again.

reviews.reviewTitle: Beautiful with a nice drape to them
reviews.reviewText: I love the feel and look of these curtains. They hang very nice and the colors are soft and subtle. They look wonderful with coral tones. High quality and extremely good value.

Super happy to see these show up at my door all beachy and fabulous.Excellent quality at a very reasonable price.The weight is perfect, they hang beautifully. I've ordered a lot of curtain panels online and they are far and away the best in terms of look, weight, hang.Someone took a lot of care to pack these up. Bubble wrap between grommets and all.LOVE!

We recently replaced the window in our living room which was a big window (155"x58") and we also replaced teh rod and these windows added a great warmth and shade to the room. The sheerness was enough so that you couldn't see is but still let in enough light so you could see in the room with feeling like you were in a cave. Being a 2-pk was great as we ordered 4 but used only 3 and kept one as a spare (just in case), you know how stuff comes and goes on Amazon. This was a great deal and we love them.

Just received these curtains - pleasantly surprised at how quickly they arrived and how nice they are.I have yet to wash them but they are a beautiful linen look and the perfect length I really love them.I bought the black and white and I gave a 4 for overall rating because the white has a pinkish hue - not sure if its picking it up from floors or walls which are brown and beige but I was a little taken back when I put them up. I will live with it cause they are quite nice and cant beat the price - maybe the pink will fade with wash and wear - I love the curtains! I bought 4 panels for our sliding glass doors for fullness and full coverage.

I love these curtains. The texture is linen like and they are lightweight. The sheerness is perfect for us. They still let a little light in but you can’t see through them. I went outside at night with the lights on inside and you could just see the lights, not shadows. I do with they came in wider lengths though. We ended up having to buy 4 sets for our needs.
